title: Variables and Mutability
description: In this lab, we explore the concept of mutability in Rust, discussing how variables are immutable by default and how to make them mutable using the `mut` keyword, and highlighting the importance of immutability for safety and concurrency while still acknowledging the usefulness of mutability in certain situations.
